articles.title: Kim Jong Il Reelected as General Secretary
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Reelected as General Secretary
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was reelected as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the conference of the WPK convened at a historic time when a signal turn is being effected in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					 The conference solemnly declared internally and externally that Kim Jong Il was reelected as general secretary of the WPK with unanimous will and wishes of all the party members, servicepersons and people of the DPRK as he performed the immortal exploits to shine long in the history of the country and developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, ever-victorious Juche-type revolutionary party by wisely leading the revolutionary cause of Juche to victories only with his outstanding idea and uncommon revolutionary practices for half a century since he embarked upon the road of the revolution in his early years.
					
					 His reelection to the supreme post of the WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, is the highest glory and happiness of millions of party members and servicepersons and people of the DPRK and a great auspicious event of the country and the nation.
					
					His reelection is an expression of absolute support and trust of all the party members, the servicepersons and the people in Kim Jong Il who provided the great guiding idea indicating the path to be followed by the Party, the revolution and the era of independence by comprehensively developing and enriching the immortal Juche idea, converted the DPRK into invincible politico-ideological power, military power and scientific and technological power and consolidated the single-minded unity of the leader, the Party, the army and the people as firm as a rock by successfully embodying the idea, opened a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years with his Songun revolutionary leadership and has made undying contribution to carrying out the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 It marked a great political event that strikingly demonstrated the unshakable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to resolutely defend and glorify the undying revolutionary feats performed by Kim Il Sung and accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause under the tested and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK Conference Held
articles.content:
WPK Conference Held
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea was held with success in Pyongyang on Sept. 28.
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, was present at the Conference.
					
					 Present there were delegates elected at the meeting of WPK delegates of the Korean People's Army and provincial and political bureaus' meetings of delegates of the WPK.
					
					 Officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and officials in the fields of science, education, public health, culture and arts and media attended the Conference as observers.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of President Kim Il Sung who successfully accomplished the cause of founding the Juche-type revolutionary party for the first time in history and developed the WPK into a powerful ever-victorious staff of the revolution.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam made an opening address.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim worked as chairman at the Conference upon authorization by the consultative meeting of provincial delegates.
					
					 The Conference elected its Presidium.
					
					 The Presidium included Kim Jong Il and Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Chun, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Paek Se Bong, U Tong Chuk and Ju Kyu Chang.
					
					 The Conference decided on the following agenda items.
					
					1. On the reelection of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK
					
					2. On the revision of the WPK rules
					
					3. Election of the central leadership body of the WPK
					
					 The Conference discussed the first agenda item.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam delivered a speech proposing Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He said in his speech that Kim Jong Il has devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the nation and the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche only for decades since he embarked upon the road of the revolution.
					
					 The half a century-long history of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary activities was a history of heroic struggles in which he blazed the path with his ceaseless thinking and pursuit and extraordinary energy and a history of victories in which he made gigantic creation and innovations with his iron will and pluck, the speaker said, and continued:
					
					 The recent meeting of WPK delegates of the KPA and meetings of provincial and political bureaus elected Kim Jong Il as a delegate of the WPK Conference reflecting the unanimous will of the army and people of the DPRK to invariably hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Having Kim Jong Il at the top post of the WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, is the greatest happiness and highest honor of all the party members, servicepersons and people.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam courteously proposed to the Conference the reelection of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and wishes of all the party members, servicepersons and people of the country.
					
					 Then followed speeches by Chief of the KPA General Staff Ri Yong Ho who is a delegate of the KPA party organization, First Secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Ri Yong Chol who is a delegate of the Pyongyang City party organization, Chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea Hyon Sang Ju who is a delegate of the Jagang Provincial party organization, Chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Ri Myong Gil who is a delegate of the North Phyongan Provincial party organization and President of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently Minister of Higher Education Song Ja Rip who is a delegate of the Pyongyang City party organization.
					
					 The speakers fully supported and approved in unison the proposal of the Conference on reelecting Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK. 
					
					 A resolution of the WPK Conference on reelecting Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK was read out there.
					
					 The Conference discussed the second agenda item.
					
					 A resolution on the revision of the WPK rules was adopted.
					
					 The Conference discussed the third agenda item.
					
					 The Conference declared that Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK and outstanding leader who led the party and the revolution to victories only, would be always held in esteem at the supreme leadership organ of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and wishes of all the party members, servicepersons and people.
					
					 It also declared that Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, was reelected as member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, member of the C.C., the WPK and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK according to the WPK rules and the detailed regulations for the election of the supreme leadership body of the WPK.
					
					 The Conference elected the central leadership body of the WPK.
					
					 Then followed the election of members and alternate members of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Candidates for the members and alternate members of the C.C., the WPK were elected as members and alternate members of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The members of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK were elected.
					
					 Candidates for the members of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK were elected as members of the commission.
					
					 The Conference notified its participants of the decisions of the September 2010 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The results of the election of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and the secretaries of the C.C., the WPK and organization of the Secretariat were made public there.
					
					 The results of organization of the Central Military Commission of the WPK were released.
					
					 The appointment of the department directors of the C.C., the WPK and the editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, an organ of the C.C., the WPK, and the results of election of the Control Commission of the C.C., the WPK were made public.
					
					 The Conference notified its participants of the decisions made at the First Plenary Meeting of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam made a closing speech. 
					
					 The Conference marked a significant occasion that demonstrated the revolutionary faith and will of all the party members, servicepersons and people to glorify the WPK as the glorious party of Kim Il Sung for all ages and accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu by invariably having Kim Jong Il, peerless political elder and illustrious Songun commander, at the top post of the party and the revolution.

articles.title: Resolution of WPK Conference on Revision of Rules
articles.content:
Resolution of WPK Conference on Revision of Rules
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The following is the resolution of the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea on the revision of the rules of the WPK adopted on Sept. 28: 
					 The rules of the WPK have basic norms of the party to successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung by applying its great exploits and experience to its building and activities, thoroughly establishing the monolithic ideology and leadership in the party, firmly building the party ranks organizationally and ideologically and increasing its militancy and leadership function. 
					
					 The party rules revised and supplemented at the 6th Congress of the WPK have played a great role in achieving its single-minded unity and strengthening and developing it into powerful militant ranks with a high degree of organization and discipline and successfully providing the party's leadership over the struggle to defend and glorify socialism centered on the popular masses under the tested and experienced leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The present reality in which a historic turn is taking place in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause, calls for revising the party rules so that the WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, may be strengthened in every way and its leadership role be further increased.
					
					 The proposal for revising the rules of the WPK presented to the Conference newly reflected the need to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal leader of the WPK and the revolution and the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in founding and strengthening and developing it and newly stipulated the formation of the WPK's highest leadership body and its position and role as required by the characteristic features of the party as an organizational and ideological integral whole centered on Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The duties of a party member and the contents of the work of party organizations at different levels are comprehensively revised and supplemented in the above-said proposal as required by the new era of the Juche-based revolution. New chapters "The Party and the People's Power" and "The Party Logo and Flag of the Party" are added to the party rules and the need to strengthen the party's leadership over the people's power and the youth league and enhance the role of party organizations in the People's Army is supplemented to them to meet the above-said requirement.
					
					 The Conference decided to adopt the proposal for revising the party rules as the rules of the WPK, convinced that the proposal will provide a sure guarantee for strengthening and developing the party into an eternal glorious party of Comrade Kim Il Sung and victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving socialist nation by more thoroughly ensuring the unitary leadership of Kim Jong Il over the whole party and society.

articles.title: Official Report on Plenum of WPK Central Committee
articles.content:
Official Report on Plenum of WPK Central Committee
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The following official report on the September 2010 Plenary Meeting of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee was released on September 28: 
					 The September 2010 Plenary Meeting of the WPK Central Committee was held in Pyongyang on Sept. 28.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK and chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission, was present at the meeting.
					
					 Attending it were members and alternate members of the WPK Central Committee and members of the WPK Central Auditing Commission elected at the WPK Conference.
					
					 The meeting discussed the following agenda items:
					
					1. Election of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee
					
					2. Election of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee
					
					3. Election of Secretaries of the WPK Central Committee and on Organization of the Secretariat
					
					4. On Organization of the WPK Central Military Commission
					
					5. On Appointment of Department Directors of the WPK Central Committee and the Editor-in-Chief of Rodong Sinmun, an Organ of the WPK Central Committee
					
					6. Election of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee
					
					 The meeting elected the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 It elected secretaries of the WPK Central Committee and organized the Secretariat.
					
					 It organized the WPK Central Military Commission.
					
					 It appointed department directors of the WPK Central Committee and the editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, an organ of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 It elected chairman, vice-chairmen and members of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Control Commission Elected
articles.content:
Control Commission Elected
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The September 2010 Plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee took place here on September 28. 
					 The plenum elected chairman, vice-chairmen and members of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Kuk Thae was elected chairman, Jong Myong Hak first vice-chairman, Ri Tuk Nam vice-chairman and Cha Kwan Sok, Pak Tok Man, Cha Sun Gil and Kim Yong Son members of the commission.

articles.title: First Plenum of WPK Central Auditing Commission Held
articles.content:
First Plenum of WPK Central Auditing Commission Held
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The First Plenary Meeting of the Central Auditing Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was held here on Sept. 28.
					 Present there were Kim Chang Su, Pak Myong Sun, Choe Pae Jin, Kim Chol, Sim Chol Ho, O Ryong Il, Kye Yong Sam, Ryu Hyon Sik, Ko Myong Hui, Pang Yong Uk, Jang Jong Ju, Ho Kwang Uk, Ji Tong Sik, Jong Pong Sok and Choe Kwon Su, members of the commission elected at the Conference of the WPK.
					
					 The meeting elected chairman and vice-chairperson of the commission.
					
					 Kim Chang Su was elected chairman and Pak Myong Sun vice-chairperson.

articles.title: Art Performance Given
articles.content:
Art Performance Given
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Tuesday to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The performance began with mixed choruses "Glory to General Kim Jong Il" and "Party Represents Care of the General". Put on the stage were female solos "When We Advance Following Him" and "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party," female chorus "The Way We Wish to Go" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK as unanimously desired by all the servicepersons and people and enthusiastically sang of the fortune of Kim Il Sung's Korea which greeted the auspicious event of the country and the nation and their immense emotion and joy.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers reflecting the faith and will of the enthusiastic youth in the era of Songun dashing ahead towards the eminence of a thriving nation true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students in Pyongyang were held on Tuesday to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Dancing parties of youth and students began when song "Confetti of Best Wishes" resounded through dancing places including the plazas of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 Such songs as "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General", "Our General Is the Best" and "Party Represents Care of the General" added to the festive mood.
					
					 The youth and students enthusiastically danced to the tune of songs "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party" and "Let Us Be Satellites of the Sun" with the warmest respects and congratulation to him and their iron faith to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution. 
					
					 Similar dancing parties of youth and students were held on the same day across the country.

articles.title: Finnish Delegation Arrives Here
articles.content:
Finnish Delegation Arrives Here
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism headed by Chairman Hannu Harju arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: British Party Delegation Goes Back
articles.content:
British Party Delegation Goes Back 
						
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) led by General Secretary Zane Carpenter went back after winding up its visit to the DPRK on Sept. 28.
					 During its stay it visited Mangyongdae, the E-Library and the Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University, the Party Founding Museum, the Arch of Triumph and other places.
					
					 It also appreciated the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang."

articles.title: British Party Delegation Interviewed
articles.content:
British Party Delegation Interviewed
						
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Members of the delegation of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) were interviewed by KCNA on Monday before their departure from here.
					 General Secretary of the party Zane Carpenter who led the delegation said that the Workers' Party of Korea has demonstrated its might as a strong party commanding undisputed support and trust from the popular masses and as a tested and seasoned revolutionary party, adding that it would be unthinkable without the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK has become a model to be followed by the progressive political parties aspiring after socialism, he noted, stressing that the WPK under the great leader is sure to triumph.
					
					 He reiterated his will to boost the friendly relations with the WPK and intensify the movement for the U.S. forces' pullback from south Korea and the reunification of Korea.
					
					 Ranjeet Brar, member of the Central Committee of the party who visited the DPRK as member of the delegation, said that the WPK could always emerge victorious thanks to the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Blanch Carpenter, member of the Central Committee of the party who also visited the DPRK as member of its delegation, said that the Korean people are a heroic people as they are displaying their indomitable mental power, firmly believing and following their leader and party. He renewed his positive efforts to learn from the experience of the WPK and apply it to the party activities.

articles.title: Anniversary of Relation between DPRK-Chinese Schools Observed in China
articles.content:
Anniversary of Relation between DPRK-Chinese Schools Observed in China
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A calligraphic and drawing show was opened in Fusong County of China on Sept. 23 to mark the first anniversary of the opening of the friendly relations between Kim Song Ju Primary School of the DPRK and Experimental Primary School in Fusong County.
					 Displayed in its venue were calligraphic works and drawings presented by pupils of the two schools.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony of opening the show by the vice-director of the Educational Department of the Fusong County People's Government in Jilin Province of China and the principal of Kim Song Ju Primary School.
					
					 The speakers said that the exhibits are associated with the will of the pupils of the said schools to carry forward the DPRK-China friendly relations generation after generation, which are developing on good terms with each passing day under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and President Hu Jintao.
					
					 The participants looked round the exhibits.

articles.title: Trial Operation of UHP Electric Arc Furnace No.2 Conducted
articles.content:
Trial Operation of UHP Electric Arc Furnace No.2 Conducted
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The officials and workers of the Chollima Steel Complex built UHP electric arc furnace No. 2 and successfully conducted its trial operation on Sept. 26. 
					 All its production processes ranging from raw material feeding to melting have been placed on CNC basis. 
					
					 In the meantime, they completely finished the projects for the construction of an alloyed steel production base and the reconstruction of revolving furnace No.3 of the Posan Iron Works and set up a 550 cubic-meter oxygen plant.
					
					 This helped further reinforce the production foundation of the complex as required by the Songun era and provide a sure guarantee for satisfactorily ensuring the production of Juche iron and steel and alloyed steel.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Chongjin
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Chongjin
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, was staged in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province from Sept. 16 to 27.
					 Appreciating the performance were officials of party and power bodies and working people's organizations, working people and youth and students in province.
					
					 The officials, working people and youth of the province are dynamically advancing toward a bright future while making their lives worthwhile by performing feats in the gigantic drive for building a thriving nation true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il in the same militant spirit as displayed by the people in the era of Chollima.

articles.title: Rice Harvest Begins
articles.content:
Rice Harvest Begins
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Rice harvest has begun in rural communities in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The farms in South Hwanghae Province have worked out a detailed harvest program based on specificities of rice strains and climate conditions to carry it out without fail.
					
					 Those in South Phyongan Province have operated reaping machines and tools at full capacity from the first day of rice harvest, after thoroughly repairing them and keeping them in good condition.
					
					 Rice harvest and thrashing are going on simultaneously in North Hwanghae Province.  
					
					 Rice harvest is in full swing in South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and other provinces, except the northern highlands.

articles.title: Training Centre of Weightlifters
articles.content:
Training Centre of Weightlifters
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Tongrim County Juvenile Sports School in North Phyongan Province is famous in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for training up-and-coming weightlifters.
					 The school, with a nearly 60-year-long history, boasts of some world weightlifting stars.
					
					 Among them are Kim Myong Nam who won a gold medal at the World Weightlifting Championships held in November Juche 79 (1990), Ri Song Hui who was crowned with the titles of Labor Hero and People's Athlete after distinguishing herself at the 15th and 16th World Women's Weightlifting Championships and Pak Hyon Suk who took a gold medal at the 29th Olympiad.
					
					 Scores of its graduates set new records and bagged lots of medals at national weightlifting tournaments.
					
					 The achievements of the school are attributable to properly selecting reserves and guiding their training in a scientific way.
					
					 The school has directed a special attention to selecting those suitable for weightlifting in kinesthetic and physical aspects and providing them with basic techniques.
					
					 Videos of fine matches at local and international tournaments are also utilized in training the students.
					
					 The modernly-equipped school also sends some of its trainers to national universities and sports teams to learn advanced training methods and experience.
					
					 It has steadily improved the training and living conditions for the students.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-submarine Exercise Blasted
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-submarine Exercise Blasted
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. imperialist aggression troops kicked off a five day-long DPRK-targeted provocative joint anti-submarine exercise in the West Sea of Korea on Sept. 27. Involved in this saber-rattling are huge armed forces of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces including destroyers, escort ships, ocean-observation ships, high-speed assault submarines and patrol planes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The warmongers are describing the maneuver as a drill to cope with "submarine infiltration" by somebody, but this is nothing but a subterfuge.
					
					 The above-said joint anti-submarine exercise is a dangerous provocative saber-rattling to steadily escalate military confrontation and tensions on the Korean Peninsula in a bid to bar the inter-Korean relations from improving and drive the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The DPRK has recently taken such an initiative as advancing a series of positive proposals for improving the inter-Korean relations and made positive efforts to put them into practice in order to defuse the touch and go situation on the peninsula.
					
					 The provocative war exercises being staged by the south Korean war-like forces in collusion with the U.S. are increasing the military threat to the DPRK and escalating tensions. These anti-dialogue and anti-peace actions diametrically run counter to the trend of times.
					
					 South Korea's "military policy toward the north" is making an undisguised switchover to a dangerous strategy for a preemptive attack. The gentries of the "Grand National Party" are becoming increasingly assertive for defining the DPRK as the "principal enemy" in the "defense white paper".
					
					 Should the south Korean authorities persist in their provocative war exercises in conspiracy with foreign forces, peace and stability will never settle on the Korean Peninsula but confrontation and distrust between the north and the south will further fester and this will lead to the outbreak of a nuclear war.
					
					 They had better pay heed to the demands of the nation and face up to trend of the times and stop at once their moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK which are harmful to them either.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted Joint Military Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea at a press conference in Seoul on Sept. 27 denounced the warmongers for staging joint anti-submarine exercises threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					 The organization accused the United States and the south Korean puppet authorities of staging joint anti-submarine exercises in waters of the West Sea of Korea with latest war equipment including destroyers, submarines, patrol craft and patrol planes involved.
					
					 They are contemplating staging carrier-based surprise assault drills in the West Sea of Korea in October by introducing "George Washington", the organization noted, adding that these ceaseless war maneuvers are obviously a threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It demanded the earliest possible halt to all the hostile actions including the joint anti-submarine exercises which throw hurdles in the way of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula and concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Review History of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Review History of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A 2010 national Fukuoka meeting took place in Japan on Sept. 18 to review the history of Koreans in Japan and observe the month of their human rights. 
					 Present there were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and concurrently chairman of its Rights and Welfare Committee, officials of Chongryon in different regions, Koreans in Japan and Japanese figures. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Referring to the significance of the meeting, speakers stressed that the campaign for reviewing the history of Koreans in Japan and their human rights developed into a monthly one from a weekly one, thereby becoming a new important movement for making Japan redress the crimes it committed in the past and improving the DPRK-Japan relations. 
					
					 Reports entitled "Why was Korea reduced to a colony on the day when it lost its sovereignty?" and "Now is the time to work for peace and friendship" were made by Kang Song Un, curator of the Library of Joson University, and Sumiko Shimizu, representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women. 
					
					 The meeting adopted an appeal urging the Japanese government to immediately roll back its policy of discrimination against the Koreans in Japan and opt for normalizing the relations with the DPRK on the basis of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and a written request urging it to include the Korean schools in tuition-free program.

articles.title: WPK's Policy Favored
articles.content:
WPK's Policy Favored
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, issued a statement on Sept. 20 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The leadership of the WPK regarding the Juche idea as its guideline is very important and essential, the statement said, noting that the Korean people have steadily increased the military might under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.
					
					The 65th birthday of the WPK offers the members of the Leadership of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru an important opportunity to get a better understanding of the prominent guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, it said, and went on:
					
					 We deeply realized that the Pyongyang Declaration, signed by the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru in 1992, is the joint action programme of the progressive parties struggling against the imperialists' moves and the historic declaration as it announced that only socialism makes it possible to build a peaceful, independent, happy, new world.
					
					 The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru highly estimates the WPK's policy which has wisely led the DPRK to steadfastly defend socialism, the statement said, noting with high appreciation that Kim Il Sung realized the immortal historic cause by founding the WPK and Kim Jong Il has upheld the victorious banner of the Korean revolution for the happiness of the people.

articles.title: DPRK's Reunification Proposal Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Reunification Proposal Supported 
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Tavee Viriyatoon, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, made public a statement on Sept. 24 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 Noting that at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October 1980, President Kim Il Sung set forth the proposal for reunifying Korea by founding a federal republic on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems, the statement described the formula of federation as the most just reunification proposal.
					
					 It said that the proposal for reunification by means of federation fully conforms to the actual conditions of the north and the south of Korea and also favors the interests of the countries concerned.
					
					 Acknowledging the DFRK founding proposal as the most reasonable way for Korea's reunification, the association expresses full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to reunify the country by means of federation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Sept. 22, the 61st death anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine. 
					 The statement said that the organizations remember with deep emotion Kim Jong Suk who established her fame as the crack shot in every battle and set a noble example of lifeguard for President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk was an indomitable revolutionary fighter, woman commander of the anti-Japanese war and pioneer of the Korean women's movement, it stressed, adding that she made great contributions to the work for building new democratic Korea and emancipating the women from the shackles of feudalism true to the intention of Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country.
					
					 She also provided the bright future of Korea, the statement said.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- On April 15, Juche 86 (1997) General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected an army unit defending Height 1211 in the frontline area.
					 The officials accompanying him were worried about his safety because of the rugged road to the height and a thick fog. 
					
					 When the car carrying him reached the foot of the mountain, the fog suddenly disappeared with the mountain road clearly seen.
					
					 The officials were relieved at the phenomenon, but still afraid that his appearance on the height might draw the enemy's observation.
					
					 When the leader climbed to the top of the mountain, however, the ridge was covered with clouds all of a sudden.
					
					 As he reached the observation post on the ridge, the enemy side was brightly illuminated by the sun.
					
					 The officials marveled at the wonder of nature.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the situation of the enemy side 1,000 meters away from the observation post, he gave important tasks to increase the unit's combat efficiency in every way and turn the height into an impregnable fortress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Il emitio el dia 27 la orden No. 0051 sobre el ascenso de grados militares de comandantes del EPC.
					  En la orden, el Comandante Supremo senalo que hoy dia, todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes conmemoran significativamente el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con el infinito respeto y veneracion al Presidente Kim Il Sung quien abrio la nueva historia de construccion de un partido revolucionario de la epoca de independencia y fortalecio el PTC como filas de vanguardias de la revolucion de alto prestigio e invencible poderio.
					
					  Subrayo que el PTC, nacido de la profunda y solida raiz de la revolucion antijaponesa, vino cumpliendo honrosamente desde el primer dia de su fundacion la mision y el deber de Estado Mayor politico de la revolucion coreana y realizo inmortales hazanas que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					  El EPC ha crecido firmemente como el ejercito del Lider y del Partido y pone de pleno manifiesto su poderio de fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu, apunto y anadio que asimismo logra meritos heroicos, que seran registrados eternamente en la historia, en la defensa de la patria y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista defendiendo a costa de la vida con fusiles a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					  Ordeno elevar en ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del glorioso PTC los grados militares de los comandantes del EPC crecidos en el regazo del partido y el lider, expresando la conviccion de que en lo adelante tambien, ellos cumpliran con toda su honrosa mision y deber como pilar y grueso de la revolucion en apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del partido y cumplir hasta el final con fusiles la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el Paektu.
					
					  Segun la orden, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Un, Choe Ryong Hae y otros 3 llegaron a ser los generales de ejercito y Ryu Kyong, el coronel general.
					
					  Ro Hung Se, Ri Tu Song y otros 4 recibieron el grado de teniente general y Jo Kyong Jun, Jang To Yong, Mun Jong Chol y otros 24, el titulo de mayor general.

articles.title: Sesionada la Conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Sesionada la Conferencia del PTC
 Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 28 en esta capital la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la ocasion participo el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Tambien asistieron los delegados electos en las reuniones de los delegados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las provincias y de las direcciones politicas, del PTC.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes como observadores los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los militares del EPC y los funcionarios de los sectores de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, cultura y arte, prensa e informacion.
					
					  Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien cumplio exitosamente por primera vez en la historia la causa de fundacion del partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano y convirtio el PTC en el invencible y poderoso estado mayor de la revolucion.
					
					  En la ocasion Kim Yong Nam pronuncio la palabra inaugural.
					
					  Por encargo de la junta consultiva de los delegados de todas las provincias, Choe Yong Rim trabajo como presidente de la Conferencia.
					
					  La Conferencia eligio la presidencia.
					
					  Como miembros de ella han sido elegidos el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Chun, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Paek Se Bong, U Tong Chuk y Ju Kyu Chang.
					
					  La Conferencia determino los siguientes puntos de la agenda:
					
					1. Para elegir invariablemente al gran Dirigente camarada Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC
					
					2. Sobre la enmienda del estatuto del PTC
					
					3. La eleccion del organo directivo central del PTC
					
					  En la reunion fue debatido el primer punto de la agenda.
					
					  Kim Yong Nam pronuncio el discurso para elegir invariable y altamente al camarada Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC.
					
					  El senalo que durante varios decenios desde el comienzo de sus actividades revolucionarias hasta hoy, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dedico todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la patria y la nacion y por la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Subrayo que la historia de medio siglo de las actividades revolucionarias del Dirigente fue la trayectoria de lucha heroica, en que el recorrio un camino inexplorado superando las dificultades con sus incesantes meditaciones, estudios y extraordinarios esfuerzos, y la cronica de victorias en que vino alcanzando grandes creaciones y cambios con su ferrea voluntad y audacia.
					
					  Destaco que las reuniones de los delegados del partido del EPC y de las provincias y las direcciones politicas eligieron al Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC tomando en cuenta la unanime voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de enaltecerle invariable y altamente como Secretario General del PTC.
					
					  Tener al Dirigente en el cargo cimero del PTC, organizador y orientador de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano, es la maxima felicidad y gloria para los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes, apunto.
					
					  En reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes de todo el pais, propuso cortesmente a la Conferencia ratificar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC.  
					
					　Intervinieron Ri Yong Ho, delegado de la organizacion del partido del ejercito popular y jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea; Ri Yong Chol, delegado de la organizacion del partido de la ciudad de Pyongyang y primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung; Hyon Sang Ju, delegado de la organizacion del partido de la provincia de Jagang y presidente del CC de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea; Ri Myong Gil, delegado de la organizacion del partido de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y presidente del CC de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea; Song Ja Rip, delegado de la organizacion del partido de la ciudad de Pyongyang, rector general de la Universidad    Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior. 
					
					  Los oradores apoyaron y aprobaron total y unanimemente la propuesta de la Conferencia de ratificar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC.
					
					  Se dio lectura a la resolucion de la conferencia sobre el particular.
					
					  La Conferencia discutio el segundo punto de la agenda.
					
					  Fue aprobada la resolucion sobre la enmienda del estatuto del PTC.
					
					  Luego, ha sido debatido el tercer punto de la agenda.
					
					  En reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y habitantes, la Conferencia declaro que tendria para siempre en el maximo organo directivo del PTC al extraordinario Lider           Kim Il Sung, quien fundo el PTC y condujo el partido y la revolucion a la senda de victorias. 
					
					   La conferencia anuncio tambien que segun el estatuto del PTC y reglamento detallado para la eleccion del maximo organo directivo del PTC, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  PTC, ha sido elegido como miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico, del Buro Politico y del CC del PTC y Presidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC.
					
					  La Conferencia eligio el organo directivo central del PTC.
					
					  Se realizo la eleccion de los miembros y los miembros suplentes del CC del PTC.
					
					  Los candidatos a miembros y miembros suplentes del CC del PTC fueron electos como miembros y miembros suplentes del CC del PTC.
					
					  Se realizo la eleccion de los miembros de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC.
					
					  Fueron elegidos los candidatos a miembros de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC como miembros de esta entidad.
					
					   Fue informado el contenido de la resolucion del pleno de septiembre de 2010 del CC del PTC.
					
					Quedaron publicados el resultado de la eleccion del Presidium del Buro Politico, el Buro Politico, los secretarios del CC del PTC y el de la organizacion del Secretariado.
					
					  Fue anunciado el resultado de organizacion de la Comision Militar Central del PTC.
					
					Fueron comunicados el resultado del nombramiento de los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC y el editor jefe del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, organo del CC del PTC, y el de la eleccion de la Comision Central de Control del PTC.
					
					  En la Conferencia fue informado el contenido de la resolucion del primer pleno de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC.
					
					  En la ocasion Kim Yong Nam pronuncio el discurso de clausura. 
					
					  La Conferencia del PTC devino una oportunidad significativa que demostro a todo el mundo la conviccion y la voluntad revolucionarias de todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y habitantes de glorificar para siempre el PTC como partido del Presidente        Kim Il Sung y llevar a feliz termino la autoctona causa revolucionaria del Songun iniciada en el monte Paektu teniendo invariablemente al Dirigente      Kim Jong Il, veterano politico sin par y General Insigne del Songun, en el cargo supremo del partido y la revolucion.

articles.title: Resolucion sobre la enmienda del estatuto del PTC
articles.content:
Resolucion sobre la enmienda del estatuto del PTC
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) fue aprobada la siguiente resolucion sobre la enmienda del estatuto del PTC:
					  El estatuto del PTC es el reglamento principal del partido para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung al materializar grandes proezas y experiencias logradas por el partido en la construccion y las actividades del mismo, mantener estrictamente el caracter unico de la idea y direccion en el partido, preparar firmemente en lo organizativo e ideologico las filas del partido y elevar la combatividad y la facultad directiva de este.
					
					  El estatuto del PTC enmendado y suplementado en el VI Congreso del PTC cumplio un gran papel en lograr la unidad monolitica del partido y desarrollarlo como poderosas filas combativas muy organizadas y disciplinadas y llevar al triunfo la lucha del mismo por defender y glorificar el socialismo centrado en las masas populares bajo la probada y diestra guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  La realidad de hoy, en que se logra un cambio historico en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de la revolucion del Songun, demanda enmendar el estatuto del partido para fortalecer por todos los medios el PTC, organizador y orientador de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano, y elevar mas su papel directriz.
					
					  El proyecto de enmienda del estatuto del PTC presentado en la Conferencia del PTC se refiere nuevamente al enaltecimiento del Presidente         Kim Il Sung como eterno lider de nuestro partido y revolucion y a las inmortales hazanas de el y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas en la fundacion y el desarrollo del PTC. Estipulo nuevamente tambien la composicion, la posicion y el papel del maximo organo directivo del PTC conforme a la caracteristica del mismo, entidad unificada en torno al Dirigente en lo organizativo e ideologico.
					
					  Tambien, enmendo y suplemento en sentido general el deber del militante del partido y el contenido de trabajo de las organizaciones del partido a distintos niveles conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca de la revolucion jucheana.
					
					  Establecio nuevamente los capitulos del "Partido y el Poder popular" y "Emblema y Bandera del Partido" y adiciono los parrafos sobre el fortalecimiento de la direccion del partido sobre el Poder popular y la union de la juventud y la elevacion del papel de las organizaciones partidistas del ejercito popular.
					
					  La Conferencia del PTC decide aprobar el proyecto de enmienda como estatuto del PTC partiendo de la conviccion de que ese proyecto fortalecera el PTC como eterno y glorioso partido de Kim Il Sung y garantizara con firmeza el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista, al garantizar con mas firmeza la direccion unica del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre todo el partido y toda la sociedad.

articles.title: Efectuado primer pleno de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC
articles.content:
Efectuado primer pleno de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en esta capital el primer pleno de la Comision Central Revisora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la ocasion participaron los miembros de la citada comision electos en la Conferencia del Partido: Kim Chang Su, Pak Myong Sun, Choe Pae Jin, Kim Chol, Sim Chol Ho, O Ryong Il, Kye Yong Sam, Ryu Hyon Sik, Ko Myong Hui, Pang Yong Uk, Jang Jong Ju, Ho Kwang Uk, Ji Tong Sik, Jong Pong Sok y Choe Kwon Su.

					  Kim Chang Su fue electo como presidente y Pak Myong Sun, como vicepresidenta.
